name: Left Behind: A Dead By Daylight Fangame
name_original: Left Behind: A Dead By Daylight Fangame
description:
Content Warning for Graphic Violence and Adult themes Intended for Mature Audiences only. Player Discretion is advised!

-

Left Behind: A Dead by Daylight Fangame is a love letter to all the people who made the community of Dead by Daylight an amazing experience for me over these past 3 years. Intended to be a 24hr game jam, this 64 hour passion project quickly grew bigger than I was prepared for.

This visual fan-fiction follows a trial behind the back of Bill Overbeck and other survivors. Will he survive?? YOU decide!

 Includes 5 different endings, and runs about 20 minutes long. Story features Bill Overbeck, Jeff Johansen, Claudette Morel, Quentin Smith and Freddy Krueger from Dead by Daylights Roster.

I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it! Big thank you to the community behind The Archives who have made Dead by Daylight worth creating for. Without you I don't think I would have made as much art as I have, or have had as much fun.

Thank you!
